general.byline: Web Designer/ Digital Marketer in Texas, USA, He/Him
general.about:
I’m a digital marketing strategist with expertise in visual communication and websites. I create intuitive interfaces, craft SEO-driven strategies, and redefine brand identities to deliver engaging, user-focused solutions.

For your organisation, I bring a unique blend of creativity, technical skill, and strategic thinking to enhance usability, drive engagement, and achieve your goals. Let’s work together to build digital experiences that connect with your audience and deliver measurable results.

projects.heading: Website, Content and Strategy for E-Commerce success at Good Deals
projects.description:
* Developed and designed the e-commerce website with a focus on user experience.

* Created and managed content strategy, including product descriptions and visuals.

* Implemented SEO strategies to improve website visibility.

* Planned and executed marketing strategies to drive traffic and conversions.
projects.title: Website, Content and Strategy for E-Commerce success

projects.heading: Brand Identity & Digital Presence Development at Faymus Photography
projects.description:
* Redesigned the brand identity and digital presence for a photography studio to reflect a modern, creative vision.

* Created user-friendly interfaces for their portfolio website, emphasizing clean layouts and high-quality visuals to showcase their work.

* Implemented a booking flow that streamlined client inquiries and reservations.

* Worked closely with the client to ensure the design aligned with their artistic and business goals.
projects.title: Brand Identity & Digital Presence Development

projects.heading: Concept to Launch: Digital Marketing Agency Development at Screenifi
projects.description:
* Conceptualized and built the brand identity and online presence for a digital marketing agency from the ground up.

* Designed a responsive website with a focus on clear navigation and intuitive user interfaces.

* Developed marketing materials and visual assets to establish a cohesive and recognizable brand.

* Integrated user feedback into iterative design improvements, ensuring the agency's digital tools met the needs of its clients.
projects.title: Concept to Launch: Digital Marketing Agency Development

workExperience.heading: Campus Technology Associate at Southwestern Baptist Theological Seminary
workExperience.description: In this user-facing role, I provide support related to Mac & Windows - hardware, software, network connectivity for faculty, students  and guests.
workExperience.title: Campus Technology Associate

workExperience.heading: Online Presence Consultant at Screenifi
workExperience.description: I helped organisations enhance their digital footprint by designing visually engaging websites and crafting strategies that aligned with their brand goals. I assisted in improving their online visibility through digital marketing, web design, and effective visual communication.
workExperience.title: Online Presence Consultant

workExperience.heading: E-commerce Manager at Good Deals
workExperience.description: I oversaw daily operations of the online store, including product listings, inventory management, and order fulfillment. I developed and executed digital marketing strategies to drive traffic, increase conversions, and optimize customer experience.
workExperience.title: E-Commerce Manager

workExperience.heading: Broadcast Media Assistant at CFNI
workExperience.description: I assisted the state-of-the-art broadcast media department in shooting live events and directing live productions. I also monitored broadcast servers and supported equipment setups to ensure seamless live transmissions.
workExperience.title: Broadcast Media Assistant

workExperience.heading: Digital Media Coordinator at Capstone Global
workExperience.title: Digital Media Coordinator

workExperience.heading: President at College Media Club
workExperience.description: As the elected Media Club President in College, I led the club’s initiatives by overseeing media projects, organizing events. I served as a bridge between the student body and administration, advocating for initiatives like inviting Tamil movie industry veterans for workshops to enhance learning and growth.
workExperience.title: President

volunteering.heading: Digital Presence consultant at Hope City Dallas
volunteering.description:
* Crafted content strategies that boosted online engagement and enhanced the church’s digital presence.

* Repurposed sermon recordings, Sunday services, and church events into shareable social media content.

* Improved SEO to increase website visibility and rankings.

* Strengthened community engagement and expanded reach by optimizing the church’s social media presence.
volunteering.title: Digital Presence consultant

education.heading: Bachelor's Counseling and Leadership at Christ for the Nations Institute
B.Sc. Visual Communication at Bharathiyar University
